reference: Blanchard, Olivier J., and Nobuhiro Kiyotaki, 1985, Monopolistic Competition, Aggregate Demand Externalities, and the Real Effects of Nominal Money, NBER Working Paper No. 1770.
Hart, Oliver, 1982, A Model of Imperfect Competition with Keynesian Features, Quarterly Journal of Economics 87, 109-38.
Samuelson, Paul A., 1948, The Simple Mathematics of Income Determination, in Income, Employment and Policy, New York: W.W. Norton, reprinted in The Collected Scientific Papers of Paul A. Samuelson.
Solow, Robert M., 1984, Monopolistic Competition and the Multiplier, M.I.T.
Startz, Richard, 1986, Monopolistic Competition as a Foundation for Keynesian Macroeconomic Models, University of Washington.
Weitzman, Martin L., 1982, Increasing Returns and the Foundations of Unemployment Theory, Economic Journal 92, 787-804.
